item.description: Rendering mathematical equations Examples from the mathjax demo. But they work with katex as well. Rmarkdown In .Rmarkdown documents, you can use either $a \ne 0$ to get inline math: \(a \ne 0\). There is no conflict with using dollar symbols regularly, because knitr automatically escapes freestanding dollar symbols. And you can use $x = {-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac} \over 2a}.$$ to get a math paragraph:
